first.description: Active CPro members who are on the Whitelist can mint ONLY ONE.

second.description: Active CPro members will be able to return and mint up to 14 more NFTs.

third.description: Anyone on the Whitelist will be able to mint one NFT. Active CPro members can continue minting up to their limit of 14 NFTs.

last.description: Anyone will be able to mint as many NFTs as they want.
